definition: having an import not apparent to the senses nor obvious to the intelligence, someone who believes in the existence of realities beyond human comprehension
details:
adjective
- having an import not apparent to the senses nor obvious to the intelligence
= synonyms: secret
- relating to or characteristic of mysticism
= example: relating to or characteristic of mysticism
= synonyms: mystical
- relating to or resembling mysticism
= example: relating to or resembling mysticism
= synonyms: mystical
noun
- someone who believes in the existence of realities beyond human comprehension
= synonyms: religious mystic
